ygData.msgSnippet: Yes Switchblade, I hope I can trust you. I trust you more than that mechanical moron Autofire. he whispers. He lies down, and his head module opens up. Look

Subject: Re: Megatron: Returned

"Yes Switchblade, I hope I can trust you. I trust you more than that
mechanical moron Autofire." he whispers. He lies down, and his head module
opens up. "Look for a chip that dosent look like it should be there, remove
it" he barks the order.
